122311.content:
Late one evening, when Little Bear and his parents were on their way
home from the circus, Felicia, one of the acrobat fleas, who was fed up
with the circus lifestyle escaped.

Desparately seeking a place to hide, Felicia hopped onto the first place
she could find, which was coincidentally deep in Little Bear's fur.

What will happen next?
122311.title: A circus

122312.content:
Winter is a tough time for fleas.

Henry was a flea who was seriously out of luck. He was out in the
forest in the dead of winter with no place to call home. But just as
he thought all hope was lost, that's when he found him: A little bear
cub heading to a nearby house.

Normally, Henry would never think of bothering younger animals,
but he was desperate, so he hopped after the cub as fast as he could.

Did Henry make it to Little Bear's fur?
122312.title: Somewhere else

124.content:
Original author Ace Jones

Here are three what if scenarios to choose from.

What if scenario #1: What if the entire animal cast of 101 Dalmatian Street starred in a parody or spoof of The Muppets go to the movies special?

What if scenario #2: What if the entire animal cast of 101 Dalmatian Street moved their show to a different location in other words Daytona Beach Florida USA?

What if scenario #3: What if the entire animal cast of 101 Dalmatian Street train themselves to become animal sumo wrestlers?
124.title: 101 Dalmatian Street.

choices: The cast start their animal sumo wrestling adventure.
Cut to later on as they're training themselves.
Cut to a later time as their training is complete.
1243.content:
Original author Ace Jones

The city: Camden Town UK.

The time: Present Day.

The Story: It all started one day in Camden Town UK as one of the show's animal cast members of 101 Dalmatian Street thought about a sumo stable that's made for animals in Camden Town as he shared his thoughts with everyone.

"For some time I've been walking past a sumo stable that's made for animals in town and I thought to myself what if we could become animal sumo wrestlers for after all it could definitely be worth a try." Fergus the fox said as he shared his thoughts with everyone.

"Wait I always thought sumo wrestling was a human sport not an animal sport Fergus?" Dylan said as he reminded Fergus that sumo wrestling was a human sport.

"After all I've always wanted to try my paw at sumo wrestling, as I'm all for it." Dolly Dalmatian said as she loved the idea of animal sumo wrestling.

"I think Fergus may be onto something here for after all I've always wondered what it would be like to be an animal sumo wrestler." Hansel the husky replied as he was excited at the prospect of becoming an animal sumo wrestler himself.

"Well everyone's excited about this save for d-dog himself ergo how about it d-dog are you in?" Fergus asked Dylan as Dylan seemed to be reluctant about this.

"Yeah bro after all it's a known fact that chicks are attracted to sumo wrestlers and Portia would love it if you fattened yourself up." Dolly said as she stated her case to her brother.

"How about it son for after all sumo wrestling has always been considered to be a family sport?" Doug asked as he wanted to his son to join in all the fun.

"Oh for the love of dog all right all right I'll do it but I don't have to like it." Dylan said as he reluctantly and begrudgingly agreed much to the delight of his family and friends.
1243.title: what if scenario#3.

choices: Back at home the family reminisces about training themselves.
Elsewhere the others reminisce about training themselves as well.
12433.content:
After the show's cast started their animal sumo adventure, they constantly trained themselves day after day until their animal sumo stable's kindly elderly stable master his wife and their lovely daughter stood right in front of the sumo stable's huge sumo wrestlers as he proudly addressed them.

"My students it gives me great pleasure to announce your training is now complete as you're animal sumo wrestlers, also there will be an upcoming tournament that will be held here in Camden Town in a few days as our animal sumo stable's own best and brightest animal sumo wrestlers will compete against the city's other animal sumo stables and their best and brightest animal sumo wrestlers in a few days time, ergo you can now go home as you're no longer required to stay here at our animal sumo stable." The kindly elderly stable master said.

Dylan and the others proudly walked out of the sumo stable with their heads held high as their training was complete as Dylan thought to himself as he walked back home with his family whilst Hansel Fergus and the others went back to their homes.

"When our animal sumo adventure started I'd thought I was going to at least have second thoughts about going through with this, but the stable's kindly elderly stable master reminded us that whenever the going gets tough, the tough gets going as he not only trained us day after day but he also fattened us up as he also always motivated us to give it our best shot and not to give up either, after all we have our sumo stable's kindly elderly stable master to thank along with the stable's other animal sumo wrestlers as well." Dylan thought to himself as he proudly smiled.
12433.title: Cut to a later time as their training is complete.

info.brief_description: welcome oneandall to fulfill your what ifs scenarios Points willbe given for good addition
info.description:
Okay here is the rules its not many so please follow them.
0) don’t worry about the ratings I can raise it if becomes necessary

1) only English, you can have some words in other languish but make sure to have a translate at the bottom of the chapter

2) no boy x boy stuff, (if characters is confirmed to be gay then you don’t have to change them but there cant be any written romance between them)

3) please don’t go overboard with the OC`s, if it is to give a character a sibling or to get the story rolling or there is not enough existing characters then its okay, but use existing characters as much as possible

4. Please use comprehensible spelling and grammar to the best of your abilities. I don't want chapters full of nonsensical gibberish that no one can understand.

5) don’t make characters OoC without a reason for them to be OoC

6) I will not give any points for choice chapters, and if you add a choice chapter and it has not resulted in a story (other choices don’t count) after 1 week it will be deleted.

7) please give a brief summery about anything (if there is) that's different from canon before you do your what if

8) please have fun :)
info.pretty_title: Anime, cartoon, book and game what ifs
